description: Promoting Innovative and Sustainable Science and Technology Support to Poverty Reduction in Rural China

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Outcome 1: Enabling environment and relevant policies for Technical Task Forcedevelopment created with new and innovative approaches of the Technical Task Force initiative at different levels suggested improving rural technological extension service deliveries for better rural livelihoods and poverty reduction.

Outcome 2: Institutional and managerial capacity for the Technical Task Force Initiative built and strengthened through pilots of alternative Technical Task Force models, organisational settings and training programs to both the Technical Task Force practitioners and farmers.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
